author: Polytechnic
title: COMPATIBLE AND RARE SET
review:
VALUE FOR MONEY:
I BOUGHT THIS SET ONE WEEK AGO IN NEW-SEALED CONDITION AT THE PRICE OF 150 EUROS. IT IS GENERALLY VERY EXPESIVE BECAUSE IT IS A RARE SET AND ESPECIALLY IN THIS CONDITION.HOWEVER, I BELIEVE THAT 500% UP TO THE RELEASE'S PRISE IS INSANE.
PLAYABILITY:
YOU CAN BUILD 10 DIFFERENT CREATIONS WITH THIS SET BUT IT IS BETTER IF YOU HAVE THE SETS 5219, 5220, 5221, 5222,8735 BECAUSE THE VARIETY IS BIGGER. IT IS ALSO COMPATIBLE WITH LEGO TECHNIC SET 8466. OF COURSE YOU CAN COMBINE IT WITH YOUR OWN CREATIONS, USING YOUR IMAGINATION. 
PARTS:
THE BRICKS ARE ORDINARY, EXPEPT THE PURPLE COLORED. THE PNEUMATIC PARTS ARE GOOD AND PLENTY, IF YOU THINK THAT THE SET INCLUDES ONLY 147  PARTS AND THE PNEUMATIC ARE 10. THE BEST PART IS THE AIRTANK. IT HAS ALSO 3 EXTRA PARTS.
OVERALL RATING:
I BOUGHT THIS SET IN ORDER TO PUT IT ON THE LEGO TECHNIC SET 8466.   I HAVE RATED THE OVERALL VOTING WITH 4 STARS BECAUSE THIS IS THE LAST SET OF THE OLDER LEGO TECHNIC SETS THAT I WANTED TO COMPLETE MY TECHNIC COLLECTION AND FOR ME IT WAS AN IMPORTANT SET!
